column5: Who is it for?You are an ambitious recent graduate looking to develop a full range of skills to help launch your career in finance or accounting. This is a highly practical master's course in Investment Management so you’ll need to possess a high level of quantitative skills.Your coursework will involve you in examining accounting and finance from the perspective of those who use financial reports to evaluate company and managerial performance.ObjectivesThis one-year, full-time, expertly structured Investment Management postgraduate programme will provide you with the real-world accounting and finance expertise that leads to a wide range of rewarding international roles.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
